name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Welcome to Vityea's news!
Right now, this is all I can say.
Stay tuned for more updates!

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Yo! I'm currently in Vietnam for a short trip.
I'll be back on Saturday, 6th September 2025.
If you need to call to me, here's my Vietnamese number: +84 92 3412 346.

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hiya! I'm departing back to Cambodia today.
I'll be back around 6 or 7 PM Cambodian Time.
If y'all need some APIs to build, hit me up!
editContent:
Edit: I added a Settings page to toggle Dark Mode and Light Mode.
Check it out!

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hello There!
It's a me! Vityea (Bruh)
Unlike any type of news today.
This is a limited-time event.
It's actually getting a free email forwarder with the vityea.us.kg domain.
You can submit here: https://forms.vityea.us.kg
A random winner will be selected.
Signed: Vityea.

name: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer
content:
Hello clients!
Incase you didn't know we're doing a limited time email forwarding for free with the domain of vityea.us.kg
For no reason at all, Cloudflare is having issues with their APIs. As such, the domain forms.vityea.us.kg
See attachment below:

We apologize for not being able to serve the Google Forms to submit as this is beyond our control.

Issued announcement from: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer.
editContent:
Nan Munireachh Vityea Edit: Someone accidentally pushed/commited the JSON of "edit" false without the parameter of : causing the news to not load.
Please read before commiting!
Vityea Edit 2: Added class="black" to URL and resized image to 20px for both width and height
Vityea Edit 3: I also accidentally pushed/commited without "\" my mistake.
Vityea Edit 4: I added Link on image since it's too small to view.

name: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer
content:
Hello clients!
The issue regarding forms.vityea.us.kg not redirecting.
The issue was promptly resolved.

Issued announcement from: Vityea Website Mitigations Officer.

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hello! No one seems to be interested in the free email event.
How about moderating this website for me instead?
I don't have a lot of money but I have atleast 1 USD.
Hit me up in the Google Forms:
Apply now!
editContent: Edit: I lost all data on my hard drive and recovered it so all the projects mentioned below is either there but renamed or corrupted.

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
[No English. Only Khmer text]
ភ្ជុំនេះទើបមកពីខេត្តក្រចេះ
ខេត្តនេះទំនើបមានទាំងATMដកលុយនិងKHQRទៀត(Acleda Bank)
វត្តក៏ដាក់ផ្លាកLED Designទៀតដែលស្វាគមន៍ញាតិញាម
និយាយមែនទៅគឺអាកាសធាតុត្រជាក់ណាស់ពេលយប់តែទៅជាក្ដៅខ្លាំងវិញនៅពេលថ្ងៃ
អត់អីសរសេរទៀតទេ
ជម្រាបលា
ចុះហត្ថលេខា៖ ណន​ មុនីរាជវិទ្យា

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hello guys!
vas-comms.web.app will be soon migrated to this website you're currently viewing.
To prevent the old links from being broken we have allocated a domain called:
old.vityea.us.kg in order to preserve the site.
As you guys know, my hard drive faced data corruption so I'm working on thin ice here.
I have managed to recover atleast 40% of the current data.
As soon as I'm done archiving, I will re-route all the links from: vas-comms.web.app to vityea.us.kg with the exception of some links being redirected to: old.vityea.us.kg
Anyhow, you can view the original site by clicking here: https://vas-comms.web.app/ or the new site: https://old.vityea.us.kg/

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Hi there!
There's no updates for today but I'm working on a Cloud Point-of-sale project.
The expected price will be 10 USD monthly or 100 USD yearly.
This Cloud POS will be suitable for businesses that need to work on-the-go i.e Mobile Coffee Shops.
It will be available at one of the following domains (Subject to change):
- api.vityea.us.kg [Beta/API]
- app.vityea.us.kg [All-in-one]
- cloud.vityea.us.kg [Cloud Service Management Tool]
- pos.vityea.us.kg [The full thing]

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Welcome back!
I've added lookup.html so basically you can lookup for any related email address to see if it's valid or not.
Just head over to the Lookup Page and enter the email address you want to check.
If the email isn't valid, well you can sign up for a new one at here!
From: Vityea.

name: Nan Munireachh Vityea
content:
Happy New Year 2026 everyone!
Wishing you all the best in this new year ahead.
May this year bring you joy, success, and prosperity.
Cheers to a fantastic 2026!
From: Vityea.
